SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[UsergroupsForms] ( [UsergroupsForms_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [CoreForms_Ky] int NULL , [UtentiGruppi_Ky] int NULL , [UsergroupsForms_UserInsert] int NULL , [UsergroupsForms_UserUpdate] int NULL , [UsergroupsForms_UserDelete] int NULL , [UsergroupsForms_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [UsergroupsForms_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [UsergroupsForms_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[UsergroupsForms] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_LocalFormsGruppi PRIMARY KEY ([UsergroupsForms_Ky])
